summary: As a product manager, my ultimate goal is to ensure that the product is a success by enabling cross-functional teams to succeed. With ~8 years of experience in creating complex B2B SaaS solutions as well as AI-powered B2C features, I focus on understanding and addressing immediate user needs as well as working towards the product vision to realize strategic goals.

text: At the two-sided employment marketplace SEEK, I collaborate closely with ML engineers and data scientists to prioritize hypotheses and run rigorous experiments to produce the best job recommendations for our users. I partner with front-end teams and senior leadership to frame and drive strategic initiatives. Key achievements:
highlights: Exploring the use of LLMs, embeddings, cross-encoders and sequence modelling technology in recommendations and working with the front-end on how best to extract user intent using GenAI to improve matching.
Leading a major organization-wide initiative to unify technology and online platforms across 8 markets and 3 brands in APAC.
Driving cross-brand experiments across six recommendation products, resulting in significant year-over-year uplift in job-candidate matches.

text: During my 4+ years at ITONICS, a B2B software platform for innovation management, I led the development of a new product line with agile teams in Germany and Nepal, seeing the entire product life cycle first-hand: discovery and prototyping to launch, iteration and support.

I owned the product roadmap & backlogs, and actively contributed to product vision, strategy & pricing, working with stakeholders across the business to ensure alignment across the organization. Main achievements:
highlights: Successfully going to market with the new product line and kicking off & launching the company’s big data product offering
Establishing initiatives for data-driven decision-making in product.
Shifting from a project-based to a product-centric organization, shaping product processes & the growing product team.

roles: Product Management, BI & Marketing Working Student
text: As one of the first employees at bookingkit, I started out helping wherever necessary – working on the company website, writing blog articles & newsletters, doing graphic design work & offering support for customers. But I quickly moved towards a product and business intelligence role, and was able to create a concept around functionality to optimize prices based on past booking data.
experience.notes: [Unverified] Start and end months inferred from CV wording: “between Aug ’14 and Mar ’17.”

details: Thesis on data-driven environmental scanning and foresight.

education.degree: Foreign Studies with the Erasmus+ Program

details: Thesis on technology readiness and space tourism.

highlights: Organisation, marketing and implementation of events

references.name: Milen Zaykov
references.title: Product Manager at Softgarden
references.text: I was lucky to have Moritz both as a mentor and direct manager. He is an incredibly knowledgeable and supportive person in areas such as people management and data-driven decision-making, capable of not only steering the product vision flawlessly in the right direction by making sure that the right initiatives we prioritized, but he also constantly empowered all the product team members he was supervising. It was an amazing experience to learn and work with him.

references.name: Tikendra Chand
references.title: Senior Software Engineer at AT&T
references.relation: worked with Moritz on the same team
references.text: Moritz is the best product manager I have ever worked with. I have had a wonderful working experience with him on a big data related product for Itonics. We developed a large data collection called 'signals' and used that to develop different apps like 'insights', 'trends' etc. for Itonics's innovation management suite. He was excellent on that product. He started from scratch and successfully led the product to market. He always had answers for every type of questions around that product, always ready with product specifications and was always up to date with latest tools and technologies involved in the product like big data, AI and machine learning. Besides that, he was also handling other core products with other teams as well and was excellent on all of those. Moritz is very hard working, self-motivated, results oriented product manager with solid ideas about products he is developing. Highly Recommended!!

references.name: Dennis Brandt
references.title: Lead Software Engineer at ITONICS | Shaping Innovation
references.relation: worked with Moritz on the same team
references.text: It was an absolute delight working with Moritz for the last years! Not only has he been blessed with a fantastic character, but is also an incredibly knowledgable human! He immersed himself 100% in our suite of cloud apps and helped the scrum teams find their way through plannings and product specifications. The dynamic between product and engineering was always positive and helped keep backlog items prioritised correctly! Moritz gets many bonus points for being very knowledgable on the tech side of things! His understanding of all things code was very helpful when communicating product requirements. On a side note: His weird obsession with flexbox was a bright light in the dark world of responsive CSS! I wish Moritz all the best in his future endeavours and already envy his future colleagues - you won't find a better fit!

references.name: Michael Durst
references.title: Founder @ ITONICS, The #1 Innovation OS
references.text: Moritz is all about getting stuff done: Deep understanding of the overall company strategy, and all the details underneath. Structured product planning, task delegation, agile program and project management, team collaboration, management communication, and finally very talented in UX/ UI. Mo has the perfect balance between being very Germanic in precision, time management, and hitting deadlines and the motivation, team spirit, laughs and fun every team needs to enjoy the day-to-day operations and take everything to the next level. Mo has excellent time management and communication skills. Even during intense crunch periods, he had the drive for keeping everyone motivated, focussed, and productive. We miss his energy and smiles! Every company would be lucky to have Mo, and I couldn’t recommend him more to any team looking for a brilliant product manager, growth hacker, digitization genius and more.

references.name: Kiran Shakya
references.title: Lead Software Engineer
references.relation: worked with Moritz on the same team
references.text: I had no worries about the product specification, when Moritz was overlooking it. He is always precise to the point and has a tendency to document remarkably well. With him as a Product Owner of the cloud version of our software, I had a great opportunity working with him for more than 2 years very closely. His ability to present his ideas in a constructive way and also collaborate with the team has been always admirable. No matter how difficult it was to present at the meetings, he would always ace it at the end. We are very grateful that he had been there with us and I feel like he would be a precious gem to any company he would step into.

references.name: Salome Leshkasheli
references.title: Team Lead Frontend Engineer
references.relation: was senior to Salome but didn't manage Salome directly
references.text: I had a pleasure of working with Moritz for 2 years in the product team, and I was always in awe of his ability to juggle multiple topics in a very efficient way. He is a brilliant and talented Product Manager who really understands how to get the best out of the product. I highly recommend Moritz if you need to get the job done!

items.name: MS Office Suite
items.notes: Happy to use Google Workspace, too!

details: Hands-on with web technologies (Angular, Node.js, GraphQL) and Python or Scala for scripting, data work & analysis.
Comfortable with AI tooling such as Replit, Cursor & local model setups for image generation.
Basic knowledge of cloud infrastructure & microservices.

priorities: Enabling the team to do their best
Revisiting past decisions & avoiding repeating mistakes
Prioritizing the truly important & getting it done
aboutMe: 34 years old. Raised in Germany, India, Israel & Egypt. Happily living in Fitzroy (the closest to Berlin we could find in Melbourne) with my husband James. Fantasy nerd: Movies, TV, books... you name it. Pianist. Spacing fanatic.
